topics.title: Community Engagement and Milestones
topics.summary: The community has reached a significant milestone with 1000 issues and PRs submitted in a short time frame. This achievement highlights the active participation and collaboration within the community, fostering a vibrant development environment.

topics.title: OAuth and Security Enhancements
topics.summary: A significant PR has improved the handling of OAuth state data by utilizing the OAuth client state store instead of cookies. This change enhances security and ensures that the OAuth process is more reliable and secure for users.

topics.title: User Interface Improvements
topics.summary: Recent PRs focus on enhancing user experience through UI adjustments, such as adding cursor pointers to interactive elements and fixing tooltip behavior on mobile devices. These changes aim to create a more intuitive and responsive interface for users interacting with the application.

topics.title: Feature Additions and Enhancements
topics.summary: New features have been introduced, such as a generalized downloads chart that includes social likes, and the ability to embed Bluesky posts in markdown files. These additions aim to enhance the functionality and interactivity of the application.

topics.title: Translation and Localization Updates
topics.summary: Several PRs have been merged to improve translations and localization support, including updates to the zh-TW translations and fixing typos in existing translations. These efforts ensure that the application is accessible to a broader audience.

topics.title: Guidance and Collaboration Requests
topics.summary: Recent posts on Bluesky emphasize the need for collaboration and guidance from experienced professionals in data management and development. The community is encouraged to seek help to ensure the project's success and sustainability.
